meanings.definition: Chalehs (noun): a type of traditional Iranian flatbread
meanings.sent1: I love the smell of freshly baked chalehs.
meanings.sent2: The chalehs at the bakery looked delicious.
meanings.sent3: The chalehs on the table tempted me to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The chalehs, warm and golden, reminded me of home.
meanings.sent5: The chalehs, with their crispy crust, were a delight to eat.

meanings.definition: Chalehs (adjective): describing something as being related to or characteristic of the Chalehs region in Iran
meanings.sent1: The chalehs spices in the dish gave it an authentic taste.
meanings.sent2: The artwork showcased the vibrant colors of the Chalehs culture.
meanings.sent3: Her chalehs-inspired outfit was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The music had a chalehs rhythm that made everyone dance.
meanings.sent5: The chalehs decorations added a touch of tradition to the room.

meanings.definition: Chalehs (verb): to bake or make chalehs bread
meanings.sent1: She decided to chalehs some bread for the family gathering.
meanings.sent2: The baker chalehsed the dough with skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: I attempted to chalehs my own bread, but it didn't turn out well.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of chalehsing bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: He chalehsed the bread until it was perfectly golden brown.
